alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 3:33PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. The highest snow accumulations will be found on grassy surfaces. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake area. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore
